column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " I 'm really sorry ... about everything I said .
#Text=I was trying to teach you about patience , but I lost mine .
#Text=" Korra says : " No hard feelings ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Of course not .
#Text=By the way , you were really good out there tonight .
#Text=You moved just like an airbender !
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait ... You stayed and watched ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I did .
#Text=Pro-bending turned out to be the perfect teaching tool for you .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'll see you tomorrow for airbending practice , bright and early !
#Text=And , by the way , I kinda permanently joined the Fire Ferrets and we 're playing in the tournament in a couple of weeks !

#Text=" Main Bolin Korra Mako Tenzin Antagonists Golden Temple Tigerdillos Pinnacle Palace Platypus Bears says : " Minor Hasook Ikki Jinora Meelo Naga Oogi Referee Pema Ring announcer Shiro Shinobi Toza White Lotus sentries " Shiro Shinobi says : " A chance encounter turns Korra from pro-bending spectator to pro-bending star .
#Text=With her new teammates , Mako and Bolin , the Fire Ferrets earn a place in the championship tournament .
#Text=But meanwhile , an anti-bending revolution brews in Republic City .
#Text=Who are the Equalists ?
#Text=And what nefarious plan does the mysterious man behind the mask have in store for our hero ?
#Text=" Korra says : " What 's the big idea with making me train this early in the morning ?
#Text=The morning is evil .
#Text=" Bolin says : " We 're the rookies , so we get the worst time slot in the gym .
#Text=" Mako says : " And you 're the rookiest of us all .
#Text=We got ta get you up to speed if we wan na survive in the tournament .
#Text=Deal with it .
#Text=" Korra says : " You deal with it !
#Text="
